Deb,
 
As far as the communication I have recieved that is a correct assum=
ption.
our friends call it a communication station, it is a central point w=
here a number of technitions can 
facilitate communication with us. evident=
ly it seems to be a point of correct or superior energy.
 
bruce
Bruce Hall=
iday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: misujoey@...: Tue, 15 Ja=
n 2008 17:14:54 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Question ..




Hi Bruce, It's =
great that you are speaking to your loved ones!! I'm "kind of" under the im=
pression that my "radio sweep" (manual and "box") recordings are mostly fro=
m some sort of Control Station that can communicate with Heaven and Earth. =
Debbie--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigati=
ng@...> wrote:>> > Hi Deb,> > In my opinion and from answers to questions t=
hat I have asked> and research I have done, including speaking to my father=
 and gradmother> which I have files for. I have been told that the communic=
ation I am recieving is that of spirits of human beings> that have passed. =
ther very well could be communication from other entities that I have not g=
otten any conformation on.> > Bruce> Bruce Halliday > > > To: EVP-ITC@...: =
lisby@...: Mon, 14 Jan 2008 22:04:53 -0500Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Questi=
on ..> > > > > Probably both and then some, Debbie. I'm open to all possibi=
lities. > > Ann :)> > > > > On Jan 14, 2008, at 9:43 PM, misujoey wrote:> >=
 > > > Hi Ann and Bruce .. Thanks for taking the time to answer .. One more=
 question .. Do you believe you are speaking to Heaven, Aliens, or both?? L=
ol ..--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigatin=
g@> wrote:>> > Hi Debbie,> > My experience is that it may or may not be the=
 same entities.> > I know that does not answer your question, let me explai=
n.> If you are an established researcher with an assigned technician> most =
likely it will predominantly be the same spirit that is communicating.> > T=
here will also be other spirits that will come through with their individua=
l messages of course> but your tech/guide will dominate the communication.>=
 > There are a couple of reasons you would get different sounding spirit co=
mmunication> the first being that at all different times of the day differe=
nt radio stations are broadcasting> a myriad of different sounds. The entit=
ies trying to communicate will use whatever fragments > of sound they need =
to form the message and the sound signal changes from second to second.> > =
Thus the different sounding voices. The second reason is each different box=
 will produce it's own unique> sound such as the minibox as apposed to the =
super radio each produce a distinctive sound.> > Lastly, if you are new to =
box research you may not have a permanent tech/guide assigned yet and who e=
ver is available> at the time of your session will take control of that ses=
sion. I find that your tech does not bother to seek out recognisable > nois=
e fragments to form his or her message until you have developed a working r=
elationship as well as a personal one with them.> > There is no exact expla=
nation for any of this, it is all conjecture by the individual researcher b=
ut I try to answer any questions based on my experience.> > I hope this ans=
wer helps. Please feel free to ask any thing at any time and I'll do my bes=
t to help.> > Bruce> Bruce Halliday > > > To: EVP-ITC@: misujoey@: Mon, 14 =
Jan 2008 23:51:04 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Question ..> > > > > Does anyone =
find that each "Box" has a different group of people speaking and helping?I=
've swept "Manually", used the "MiniBox" and the "SuperBox" and there seems=
 to be a different set of people on each device. Thanks,Debbie > > > > > > =
> __________________________________________________________> Get the power=
 of Windows + Web with the new Windows Live.> http://www.windowslive.com?oc=
id=3DTXT_TAGHM_Wave2_powerofwindows_012008>> > > > > > > > ________________=

een with Windows Vista=AE + Windows Live=99.> http://www.microsoft.com/wind=
ows/shop/specialoffers.mspx?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_CPC_MediaCtr_bigscreen_012008>=

et the power of Windows + Web with the new Windows Live.
